0.5.0: [New] The `webpack.skpm.config.js` file can now return a webpack config that will be merged (instead of mutating the config)
[New] The `skpm-link` command now set the `WebKitDeveloperExtras` setting to true when enabling the dev mode (see https://developer.sketchapp.com/guides/preferences/#inspect-a-webview)
0.4.3: [Fixed] Fixed copying assets with a space in their path
0.4.2: [Improved] Use `cp` to copy the assets instead of create a new file entirely (in order to preserve the chmod)
